title: Honoring Bonnie Hauber upon the occasion of her retirement as Superintendent of the Deposit Central School District
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  honoring Bonnie Hauber upon the occasion of her
retirement as Superintendent of the Deposit Central School District

WHEREAS, New York State's commitment to education is  unparalleled;  its
history and stature are secured by the superlative caliber of its educa-
tional professionals and the students they inspire; and
  WHEREAS,  It  is the sense of this Legislative Body to acknowledge the
significant milestones in the distinguished careers of those outstanding
educational leaders, whose dedication and achievements have been instru-
mental in developing character and  academic  excellence  in  the  young
people of New York State; and
  WHEREAS,  Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its long-
standing traditions, this Legislative Body  is  justly  proud  to  honor
Bonnie  Hauber  upon the occasion of her retirement as Superintendent of
the Deposit Central School District; and
  WHEREAS, Bonnie Hauber became Superintendent of the 650-student Depos-
it Central School District in 2006; prior to her position as Superinten-
dent, she had been Principal at Maine-Endwell  Senior  High  School,  an
Assistant Principal at Union-Endicott High School and Science teacher at
Chenango Forks High School; and
  WHEREAS,  In  her position as Superintendent of Deposit Central School
District Bonnie Hauber has  made  many  contributions  to  her  district
including  successfully  overseeing  a  five-year  plan  to  improve the
district's buildings and keeping tax levy increases as low  as  possible
during the economic recession; and
  WHEREAS,  Upon  her retirement, Bonnie Hauber plans to take a year off
to do some traveling and spend time  with  her  grandchildren  in  North
Carolina; and
  WHEREAS,  Educators like Bonnie Hauber provide a tremendous service to
the future of our State  and  Nation,  inspiring  generations  of  young
people in their educational journeys and ensuring their success in their
future years; and
  WHEREAS, Bonnie Hauber has clearly had an enduring impact on the youth
of  the Deposit Central School District, as well as on the community-at-
large, and accordingly merits recognition and applause for 22  years  of
impressive dedication to others; and
  WHEREAS,  It  is  the  sense  of  this Legislative Body to commend the
efforts of those individuals who work to support our proud tradition  of
public  education  by providing their skills and talents to our schools;
now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
honor  Bonnie  Hauber upon the occasion of her retirement as Superinten-
dent of the Deposit Central School District,  and  for  her  significant
contributions  to education in New York State; and to wish her continued
success in all of her future endeavors; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Bonnie Hauber.
